REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1765 reute d f BC-INTEL-<INCT.O>-SETS-P 06-29 0099

TEXT.TITLE: INTEL <INCT.O> SETS PACT WITH SILICON COMPILER
TEXT.BODY:
Intel Corp said it has signed a letter of intent with privately-held Silicon Compiler Systems Corp under which Intel will become a value-added silicon vendor for integrated circuits designed with Silicon Compiler's GENESIL silicon compilation system. Under the proposed pact, Intel would provide initial silicon foundry services for GENESIL-based designs. GENESIL users would be able to compile their application-specific designs using Intel's 1.5-micron complementary metal-oxide semiconductor process.
Reuter
